Picked this place knowing I will not be able to get into Tickets Bar, so want to give this a shot.Started with the house vermouth.  3.75 euros each, tasty!Our server was extremely attentive as we ate early at around 1pm.  She recommended a few dishes to us and it really worked out.We started with the olives.... OMG they are revolutionary!  It made our trip to Barcelona worthwhile.The cherry tomatoes in olive oil paired really well with the shredded ham dish - it was match make heaven.Croquetas was light, airy and delicious!  Meat pie was excellent as well.  To finish off we had the melon soaked in vermouth and vacuum sealed for a few hours.  Devine!If you are a foodie, pease come check the restaurant!
